title: Hope Hicks expected to testify before House Intel Committee
text:
Hope Hicks expected to testify before House Intel Committee 8:48am EST - 01:24 
The House Intelligence Committee on Tuesday is expected to meet with White House Communications Director Hope Hicks, as part of its probe into Russia’s role in the 2016 election and whether any Trump aides colluded with the Kremlin. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The House Intelligence Committee on Tuesday is expected to meet with White House Communications Director Hope Hicks, as part of its probe into Russia’s role in the 2016 election and whether any Trump aides colluded with the Kremlin.
